title: (x) very large lowercase c - Big Caslon {Brandon S}
content:
Hi there:

Do you know what font this letter c is coming from? At first I thought it was Vincent but it’s not...

[http://johnsonbanks.co.uk/thoughtfortheweek/index.php?offset=10](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224757/http:/johnsonbanks.co.uk/thoughtfortheweek/index.php?offset=10 "http://johnsonbanks.co.uk/thoughtfortheweek/index.php?offset=10")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224757im_/http:/typophile.com/files/267_ny_spread_400_5726.jpg)

Thank you,

Mike Diaz :-)

 [‹ (x) Chapter listing inside Mighty Boosh DVDs - Cheapskate {BJ Harvey}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224757/http:/typophile.com/node/40293 "Go to previous forum topic") [Several fonts on website ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229224757/http:/typophile.com/node/40316 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
Thank you!!! I should have known better.

Mikey :-)
